name: Hungry Frog (itch) (Hobbzz)
description:
This is the first real game I have ever made and I know it is really shitty. First of all I was completly sick and wasnt really in the mood to do anything but at least I did something. It could have been better but I feel like this is good enough for my first ever project. Most of the UI and Objects were made by "levtheking". And I know I messed up with the UI. I dont really know how to change that, so Im sorry-

The Goal of this Game is to collect all of the 7 flies before the Time runs out. If the Time runs out youll be sent back to the home screen and if you collect all 7 youll also be sent back to the homescreen. Anyways I hope you have a little bit of fun at least.
